info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on User entity in Azure API Management deployment. The User entity in API Management represents the developers that call the APIs of the products to which they are subscribed.

get.description: Lists a collection of registered users in the specified service instance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |   Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith | </br>| firstName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith | </br>| lastName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith | </br>| email | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith | </br>| state | filter | eq |     | </br>| registrationDate | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt |     | </br>| note | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith | </br>| groups | expand |     |     | </br>

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip.

parameters.name: expandGroups
parameters.description: Detailed Group in response.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Lists a collection of User entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the user specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. Not required when creating an entity, but required when updating an entity.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

appType.description: Determines the type of application which send the create user request. Default is old publisher portal.

confirmation.description: Determines the type of confirmation e-mail that will be sent to the newly created user.

email.description: Email address. Must not be empty and must be unique within the service instance.

password.description: User Password. If no value is provided, a default password is generated.

properties.description: Parameters supplied to the Create User operation.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.
Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: deleteSubscriptions
parameters.description: Whether to delete user's subscription or not.

parameters.name: notify
parameters.description: Send an Account Closed Email notification to the User.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: The user details were successfully deleted.

204.description: The user details were successfully deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the user specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Specified user entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets the Shared Access Authorization Token for the User.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

expiry.description: The Expiry time of the Token. Maximum token expiry time is set to 30 days. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

keyType.description: The Key to be used to generate token for user.

properties.description: Parameters supplied to the Get User Token operation.

200.description: The response body contains the authorization token for the user.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
